basket.description: Felix can now turn the laundry basket upside down, push it to the kitchen counter, and climb on top of the basket. Babyproofing is an endless task.
basket.title: Basket

bath1.description: When Felix takes his bath, he likes to have the water running a little, so he can fill his cups. Here  he is asking for the faucet to be turned on by rubbing his palms together, which is his baby sign for water.
bath1.title: Bath 1

bath2.description: Felix LOVES playing in the water. He is always up for a bath, and usually spends close to an hour in it.
bath2.title: Bath 2

bloodymary.description:
Both at home and at restaurants, Felix no longer wants to sit in a high chair. He sits in a regular chair, no booster seat. Restaurants with booths (like here, at Luna Park) are good.

Believe it or not, Felix is dipping a straw in Dean's ultra-spicy Bloody Mary, then licking it appreciatively. A surprising drink choice for a baby who feeds on bananas and yogurts.
bloodymary.title: Bloodymary

box.description: Felix likes climbing into small containers.
box.title: Box

cabinet2.description: Climbing down can be a challenge.
cabinet2.title: Cabinet 2

car1.description: Nanny Sylvie has kept Felix and Silas every Tuesday and Thursday for the last 6 months.  Though their relationship has at times been rocky, Felix and Silas are now best friends. Silas always starts laughing when he sees Felix, and Felix smiles back.
car1.title: Car 1

car2.description: Silas reaches for Felix's clapping hands while Lucie secures Felix's car seat.
car2.title: Car 2

cat.description:
Spotting cats in the backyard is a morning ritual.

In the last few days, Felix has stopped using his baby sign for cat (2 fingers on the cheek). Instead, everything is a dog (open-mouth panting). Dean tries to explain the difference.
cat.title: Cat

dollars.description: In pursuit of the American dream.
dollars.title: Dollars

harmonica.description: Felix likes playing the harmonica. He is getting more subtle about it, moving it across his mouth instead of just blowing in one spot.
harmonica.title: Harmonica

hot1.description: With the weekend came a batch of hot weather very rarely seen in San Francisco at any time of the year. Felix, conditioned to balmy breezes and foggy evenings, wasn't equipped to deal with it.  A half hour at the playground made him flushed and uncomfortable.
hot1.title: Hot 1

hot2.description: We spent most of the afternoon in the yard, playing with a basin of water. Lucie demonstrates the fine art of splashing your feet.
hot2.title: Hot 2

hot3.description: Move over, Mom, let me try!
hot3.title: Hot 3

hot4.description: Oh wow, this feels even better once you take your diaper off!
hot4.title: Hot 4

hot6.description: Sunday, the beach called.  For those of you who know San Francisco, this is a rare sort of call to get. But apparently the beach called a lot of people that day. There were dogs running, people sunbathing, and kids playing in the sand everywhere.
hot6.title: Hot 6

hot7.description: Dean and Felix discuss the possibility of getting one's feet wet.
hot7.title: Hot 7

hot8.description: After much deliberation and a little soul searching on Felix's part, it was decided to get the feet wet.  This turned out to be an excellent decision.  Highly enjoyable.
hot8.title: Hot 8

description:
We had a great week. This weekend was especially blissful -- the weather has been hot, the kid has been fun, and Lucie's laryngitis has made her voice a sexy growl.

Dean sold his motorcycle. Almost every single person says they're sorry to hear that. Many ask how he's coping with the tragic loss. Dean would like to set the record straight that 1) he sold it because he doesn't use it to commute anymore, and 2) his masculinity is doing just fine without it, thank you.

New words:

  • lala: Teletubbies, or TV in general. Lala is one of the Teletubbies. When he wants to watch TV, he points to it and says "lala".
  • a-ture: voiture (French for car). He hasn't said it unpromted yet, but he has repeated it after us on several occasions.
  • nana: banana. He's only said it once, but we are confident this one will be a keeper, since banana is his favorite food.
title: March 30
